Editor, with a content view. An ContentViewTextEditor load and unload the content view model editor when reading the device. The content model is based on a ContentViewParser and some ContentViewNode. More...

Detailed Description

Editor, with a content view. An ContentViewTextEditor load and unload the content view model editor when reading the device. The content model is based on a ContentViewParser and some ContentViewNode.

XinxCodeEdit *  editor = 0,
QWidget *  parent = 0
